domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Eggheads
entity.description: Some people may consider being called an egghead an insult. Others not only embrace the title but are part of a team of eggheads on the quiz show of the same name. The Eggheads team are made up of some of Britain's top quizzers, including big-money winners from other quiz shows and other trivia Goliaths. Each episode features the Eggheads facing a team of challengers trying to beat the incumbents in a quiz competition to win a cash prize. If the Eggheads beat the challengers, the cash prize is rolled over to subsequent episodes until it is won.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
